definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
to wind around/to wrap round/to coil/tangle/to involve/to bother/to annoy

sentences.english: This season his trigger-happy days are becoming few and far between.
sentences.chinese: 这个赛季他胡搅蛮缠的时候渐渐减少。

sentences.english: Above all I do not wish to importune or compromise you.
sentences.chinese: 总之我不希望你胡搅蛮缠或妥协。

definition: to twist words and force logic (idiom)/sophistry/loud rhetoric making up for fallacious argument/shoving false arguments down people's throats
to act shamelessly/to behave in a way that leaves others tut-tutting and shaking their heads in disapproval
to make trouble without reason (idiom); to be deliberately provocative
to act shamelessly/to refuse to acknowledge that one has lost the game, or made a promise etc/to act dumb/to act as if sth never happened
unable to differentiate good from bad (idiom)/not to know what's good for one/unable to recognize others' good intentions
the guilty party files the suit/the thief cries thief
not understanding things (idiom); devoid of sense
